poem:
### Legacy of Quiet Hands

Alan, a craftsman of silence,  
hammered beauty into the bones  
of rooms and gardens, shunning  
the kettle's comfort. A gentle architect  
of lives unseen, he wired dreams  
into bricks. But in the quiet corners,  
where shadows measure time,  
his own heart's walls crumbled,  
leaving us the palimpsest of his care.
